page.title: 10HYLANDS SCHOOL CHELMSFORD
page.content:
There are 950 boys and girls between the ages of 11-18 years at this {typical Comprehensive school,}situated in Hatfield Grove on the Westlands Estate of Chelmsford.
The school has 55 full-time and 8 part-time teachers.The school requires 16 cleaners (who work various hours) and 3 ancillary helpers.
The pupils are drawn from {Writtle}, from the {Highwood }area west of Chelmsford and from the new {Chelmer {Village}development to the north-east of Chelmsford.
The pupils from Chelmer Village are bussed across Chelmsford to and from Hylands School each day.
